title: MeritChain Entry Schema
description: Schema for validating MeritChain entries representing high-resonance profile matches

platform.description: The platform where the profile was found (e.g., 'twitter', 'instagram')

resonance_score.description: Resonance score indicating how well the profile matches your criteria (0-100)

matching_traits.description: List of traits that match your criteria

red_flags.description: List of potential red flags or concerns

summary.description: Short summary of why this profile matches or doesn't match

first_message.description: Suggested first message to send to this person

should_save_to_meritchain.description: Whether this profile should be saved to the merit chain

merit_tags.description: Tags to categorize this merit entry

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when this entry was created
